entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning then near blizzard. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Near blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Near blizzard. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023
